```py
def and_perceptron(x1, x2):

    w0 = -0.5
    w1 = 0.6
    w2 = 0.6

    z = w0 + w1 * x1 + w2 * x2

    thresh = lambda x: 1 if x>= 0.5 else 0

    r = thresh(z)
    print(r)
```
